thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com
thread.title: Vicki
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Vicki

author: Vicki
title: Vicki
text: A great birthday was had when I sent an order of cupcakes to my mother in law who is living in assisted living. She was able to spread joy with her friend by enjoying her birthday cup cakes which were decorated beautifully. I had to adjust the delivery address which went flawlessly and delivery was at the most opportune time. Would definitely use them again.
